conbody.p: Please launch the installation program to install the software. Operate according to the prompt, and wait until the entire software system has been installed.
When the network encounters a failure, an error message pops up at the system status bar.

li.p: The unauthorized operation or change of a software/hardware system or connection to a network system without security certification may damage the system.
The unauthorized copying/installation of software is prohibited.
The software installation and upgrade must be completed by the UIH engineers or engineers officially authorized by UIH.
The system has certain requirements for the system resources. Installing the system on public or private computer may degrade the system performance.
After starting up the software, please check the language on software interfaces. If there is any language error, please stop operating immediately.
It is recommended that user should change the log-on password periodically and keep the password secret.
User should avoid changing the device IP address after first installation. It may cause network connection or communication error.
One or more than one backup shall be kept for recovering the system.
